name: Fundoodaa
0:
”Alexa, open fundoodaa”
”Alexa, ask Fundoodaa to tell me an animal story”
”Alexa, ask Fundoodaa for bedtime story in english”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fundoodaa
des:
An audio library of stories for family fun. 

Enjoy our growing collection of interactive audio books in English and Indian languages (Hindi, Kannada, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Gujarati, Marathi and Bengali).

These short stories engages the children of all ages and also with adults with lively audio narration, quiz, sound and music. Each story has a value to learn or bring a joyous laughter.

Once you enable the skill, get started by saying things like:

“Alexa, ask Fundoodaa to tell me an animal story”

“Alexa, ask Fundoodaa to tell me today’s story.”

“Alexa, next,” to skip a story.

“Alexa, pause,” to take a break, and “Alexa, continue” to resume listening.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
